Articles.Content:
Hey guys

I searched around a bit but couldn't find a way to contact this person directly and thought they may be on here. His names ImpossibleAviation on KerbalX and he made this ridiculous flying saucer. This thing is awesome, great IVA environment. My problem is, I can't figure out how to get out of the thing. It uses all external seats with no command module and I can't find a hatch or way out. Hoping to find ImpossibleAviation for an answer here but if anyone wants to d/l the craft and play around to figure it out that'd be awesome also; the craft is awesome.

Thanks guys!
